doc:
Jack Coleman (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Coleman_(actor) 0 John MacDonald Coleman (born February 21, 1958) is an American actor and screenwriter, known for playing the role of Steven Carrington in the 1980s prime time soap opera Dynasty (1982–1988), and for portraying Noah Bennet in the science-fiction drama series Heroes (2006–2010) as well as his recurring roles as State Senator Robert Lipton on The Office (2010–2013) and as State Senator William Bracken on Castle (2012–2015). John_MacDonald_Coleman ( born February_21_,_1958 ) is an_American_actor_and_screenwriter , known for playing the_role of Steven_Carrington in the_1980s_prime_time_soap_opera_Dynasty ( 1982 – 1988 ) , and for portraying Noah_Bennet in the_science-fiction_drama_series_Heroes ( 2006 – 2010 ) as_well_as his_recurring_roles as State_Senator_Robert_Lipton on The_Office ( 2010 – 2013 ) and as State_Senator_William_Bracken on Castle ( 2012 – 2015 ) .
